TopicTitle: Logitech x52 HOTAS Axes not recognized in control settings

Articles.Content:
Hey, folks.

As stated, none of the axis controls for my x52 seem to be working in KSP. The buttons do, however. I've tried multiple game versions with identical results. I have also tried mapping the controls with the official Logitech driver installed, and not installed, with identical results.  I have also tried the suggested Advanced Fly-By-Wire mod, which does appear to recognize the input, but still will not map.

Please tell me I am just really bad at google and that there is a simple fix for this somewhere.

 

Cheer.
